issue.body:
This issue tracks longer-term, architectural changes to the query pipeline.

Issues completed in 9.0 are visible in #31327.

* [x] #35089
* [x] #35113
* [x] #36266
* [x] #36231
* [x] #34696
* [x] #34905
* [x] #34768

rename.from: Introduce safer mechanism for accessing parameters and disabling SQL caching
rename.to: Introduce a safer mechanism for accessing parameters and disabling SQL caching
